attributes.action: Make Andrea Leadsome our PM and let her lead us OUT of the EU
attributes.additional_details: Andrea Leadsome is a mother who understands the UK need to build strong trading bonds throughout the world and grow our economy outside the EU. An experienced level headed woman who understands financial markets having previously been in banking. She takes the people of the UKs concerns over border control and immigration seriously. She will strive to take the UK to another level, a better level outside the EU.
attributes.background: Andrea Leadsome is a calm constant MP who has a clear vision of the UK after it leaves the EU. She understands the complexity of leaving and will strive to open up new tradings with countries outside the EU as well as keeping us trading to EU countries. She understands Financial markets.
